property.name: brain.port
property.description: Port that the Brain will listen on.

property.name: brain.handlers
property.description: How many handlers. Each handler handles a proxy request.

property.name: brain.queuesizeperhandler
property.description: The size of the internal processing queue each handler has.

property.name: brain.connection.maxretries
property.description: How many times Hadoop's RPC class will try to reconnect with a given proxy.

property.name: brain.connection.sleeptime
property.description: How long will it Hadoop's RPC will wait before retries.
